greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: One minus the parity of 1-fibits in Zeckendorf expansion A014417(n).
reference: Michel Rigo, Formal Languages, Automata and Numeration Systems, 2 vols., Wiley, 2014. Mentions this sequence - see "List of Sequences" in Vol. 2.
link: Leonard Rozendaal, Pisano word, tesselation, plane-filling fractal, Preprint, 2017.
formula: a(n)=a'(n+1) where a'(1)=1 and if n>=2 with F(k)<n<=F(k+1) a'(n)=1-a'(n-F(k)) where F(k)=A000045(k). E, g. F(5)=5<6<=F(6)=8 thus a'(6)=1-a'(1)=0 and a(5)=0. - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 10 2005
program: def ok(n): return 1 if n==0 else n*(2*n & n == 0)
print([1 - bin(n)[2:].count("1")%2 for n in range(1001) if ok(n)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 08 2017
xref: a(n) = A010059(A003714(n)). a(n) = 1 - A095076(n). Characteristic function of A095096. Run counts are given by A095276.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 01 2004
